snippet: The Obama administration says criminal defendants may have standing to challenge federal surveillance programs, but try telling that to prosecutors.
abstract: Adam Liptak Sidebar column holds that although the Obama administration says criminal defendants may have standing to challenge federal surveillance programs, that assertion appears to be true in theory only.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration says criminal defendants may have standing to challenge federal surveillance programs, but try telling that to prosecutors.

headline.print_headline: A Secret Surveillance Program Proves Challengeable in Theory Only
headline.main: A Secret Surveillance Program Proves Challengeable in Theory Only
